data.title: A Day in Kindergarten
data.meta_description: What does a typical day in Kindergarten at Linn-Mar look...
data.text:
What does a typical day in Kindergarten at Linn-Mar look like? Watch the video below for a visual of what Kindergarten looks like from inside the classroom.

Are you interested in having your child attend Kindergarten or Jr. Kindergarten next year, but missed the Kindergarten Enrollment Fair on March 8th, 2022? Don’t worry, just reach out to the elementary building secretary and/or building principal for the required paperwork.

If you’re not sure which building your child will attend next year, please click here to type in your home address.

If you are interested in Jr. Kindergarten, please click here for more information about the program and to fill out the survey to schedule a screening date in April.
